actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code, with respect to financing the cost of mailing certain matter at reduced rates of postage, and for other purposes.
short_title: Aid to Libraries and Free Flow of Educational and Cultural Mail Act

summary.text: Aid to Libraries and Free Flow of Educational and Cultural Mail Act - Revises the method of financing the cost of mailing specified matter at reduced rates of postage to libraries and educational institutions.

titles.title: Aid to Libraries and Free Flow of Educational and Cultural Mail Act
A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code, with respect to financing the cost of mailing certain matter at reduced rates of postage, and for other purposes.
